extendedInfo.description: Tiger Mobile is Chattanooga State's first mobile application.  Keep up to date with Chattanooga State related information when you're on the go!

reviews.title: needs improvement good start
reviews.comment: I enjoy any app that helps me to make my life easier......I do wish on the academic calander, it would recognize me and my classes or atleast let me write in my deadlines....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Student Resource
reviews.comment: For the student this app is a great tool.  Given time, additional functionality and increased integration with curriculum, campus life and the administration, this app will only get better!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: You can\'t check tiger web and really has little useful information on it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great start, simple & stable.
reviews.comment: They can build off this.  For it\'s simple stable design i give it 4 for now.
reviews.author: Austin Cates
